When are you're scheduled practice days?

> [{quoted}](name=Loony Russian ,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=momom2GE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-31T18:46:37.209+0000)
>
> When are you're scheduled practice days?

Thinking weekends. 5Pm est- 10pm est. That way people might be able to be done work and be able to play o_o since im always on it doesnt matter  {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}}

> [{quoted}](name=DarianEX,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=momom2GE,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-10-31T18:49:05.915+0000)
>
> Thinking weekends. 5Pm est- 10pm est. That way people might be able to be done work and be able to play o_o since im always on it doesnt matter  {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}}

Best time for me would be Fridays and Saturdays because I work Monday mornings at 5am. If interested can try me out
